# ECRAT

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ECRAT is to simulate water storage reservoirs providing cooling water to thermal power plants in the ERCOT.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ECRAT using `devtools`:

``` r
library(devtools)
install_github("swd-turner/ECRAT")
```

## Example

This is a basic example of use:

```{r example}
library(ECRAT)
## example to follow
```
